'''16w15a''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9.3]], released on April 11, 2016,<ref name="blog_16w15a">{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160411155628/https://mojang.com/2016/04/minecraft-snapshot-16w15a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 16w15a|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> which fixes a bug related to mob pathfinding which caused performance issues.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w15a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|94438|Server: Mob pathfinding induced massive lag in any versions 15w49a and later.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* Unlike most of the first-of-the-week snapshots, this was released on a Monday instead of Wednesday.
